title: Daimler's tech spending to dampen earnings growth
text:
Daimler's tech spending to dampen earnings growth 3:42pm GMT - 01:25 
Daimler's profit growth will be dampened this year by spending on new technologies such as electric and autonomous vehicles as it missed quarterly earnings forecasts and reported a lower margin on its Mercedes-Benz cars. Sonia Legg reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Daimler's profit growth will be dampened this year by spending on new technologies such as electric and autonomous vehicles as it missed quarterly earnings forecasts and reported a lower margin on its Mercedes-Benz cars. Sonia Legg reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DTGZMH
